result.execSummary:
The defendant Juan Ramon Hinojosa was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Juan Ramon Hinojosa is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Juan Ramon Hinojosa was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:18 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nicholas R White in court for Juan Ramon Hinojosa. Defendant Juan Ramon Hinojosa appeared by video, in custody. Includes 21CF556 and 22CF489. Court reviews case. Atty White states DE has waived right to personal appearance. Court finds Defendant freely and voluntarily waives right to personal appearance for today's proceeding. Atty White recites resolution. Court questions Defendant. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty in case 21CF556 Count 1: Battery to LE- 940.203(2) and in case 22CF489 Count 2: Misd Battery- 940.19(1). Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty. Upon motion of the State, Court dismisses 22CF489 Count 1. Sentencing arguments. 

Court Orders:

21CF556 Count 1: 60 days Jail; 47 days credit; time served

- Court Costs: $268.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through Clerk of Court
- DNA Surcharge: $250.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample 

22CF489 Count 2: 30 days jail; 42 days credit; consecutive to 21CF556 Count 1; time served

- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample


Any Bond remaining on file, apply to 21TR2281.

Adjourned at 03:40 PM
NOH (PH) returned by PO. Return to sender. Not deliverable as addressed. Unable to forward. olg
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 2, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Atty. White called JA inquiring about getting a plea date sooner than what was scheduled earlier in the day. JA reset plea with DA's Office and Atty. White to 9/2. RJG
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 12, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

re: Resolution. Filed by Atty White. includes 21CF556 & 22CF489. arc   Per SJN, Branch II is authorized to resolve Branch I case.

10:07 AM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel. Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Juan Ramon Hinojosa in court, in custody w/ Attorney Nicholas R White. Atty Ellenwood notes Officer Lubow was present to testify. Atty White waives the PH. Crt finds Def freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives preliminary hearing. Crt finds probable cause and binds Def over for trial. Atty Ellenwood has filed the Information to the case, Atty White would like to proceed with ARGN. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial. Atty White notes 21CF556 and 22CF489 are assigned to different Judges. Court does no further scheduling as matters have already been set with Branch 1. Bond continues in form and amount. Adjourned: 10:13 am.
Filed by Atty White. arc    e: DA

records.addlTxt: Appointing Atty White. km
Preliminary hearing on July 28, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Signed by SJN on 7/24/22. bph

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Andrew Baribeau and Huey's Bar. The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:08 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood and Intern Ali Casey in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson in court for Juan Ramon Hinojosa. Defendant Juan Ramon Hinojosa in court, in custody. DE qualifies for public defender. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. State requests bond. Atty. Harrelson makes bond argument, Atty. White represents DE on other pending case and will likely represent him on this case as well. Court sets bond. Court sets PH, SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 1:14 PM. kma
